mapper.select: select count(1) from t_device_mapping where domain = #{domain}
select count(1) from t_device_mapping where id = #{id} and userId =#{userId}
select deviceId from t_device where id = #{deviceId}

select id, device_id, domain, port, host, createTime, protocol, description, userId, remote_port, hostname from t_device_mapping
where status=1 and device_id in (select id from t_device where deviceId = #{deviceNo}) and domain_id in (select id from t_domain where due_time >= SYSDATE() or due_time is null)

select dm.id, dm.device_id, dm.domain, dm.port, dm.host, dm.createTime, dm.protocol, dm.description, dm.userId, dm.remote_port, dm.hostname, dm.user_domain_id, dm.auth, dm.status, dm.server_tunnel_id, dm.domain_id, td.bandwidth, td.concurrent_num, 0 todayFlow from t_device_mapping dm left join t_domain td on dm.domain_id = td.id left join user_package up on up.user_id = td.user_id where dm.device_id = #{deviceId}

select dm.id, dm.device_id, dm.domain, dm.port, dm.host, dm.createTime, dm.protocol, dm.description, dm.userId, dm.remote_port, dm.hostname, dm.auth, td.bandwidth from t_device_mapping dm left join t_domain td on dm.domain_id = td.id left join user_package up on td.user_id = up.user_id
where dm.status=1 and td.id >0 and dm.device_id in (select id from t_device where deviceId = #{deviceNo}) and (td.due_time >= SYSDATE() or td.due_time is null)

select dm.id, dm.device_id, dm.domain, dm.port, dm.host, dm.createTime, dm.protocol, dm.description, dm.userId, dm.remote_port, dm.hostname, dm.auth, td.bandwidth from t_device_mapping dm left join t_domain td on dm.domain_id = td.id left join user_package up on td.user_id = up.user_id where td.id >0 and dm.id = #{mappingId}
